title: PESEN.ID (Ordering Services)
content:
Project Description

pesen.id is an online food ordering platform designed to streamline the process of ordering from local restaurants. It provides users with an easy-to-navigate interface for browsing menus, placing orders, and tracking deliveries. The platform is built for scalability, offering a seamless experience for both customers and restaurant owners. Key features include real-time order tracking, secure payment integration, and personalized user recommendations. My role involved full-stack development, from designing the backend architecture to implementing a user-friendly frontend, ensuring efficient performance and smooth user experience.
